pre_caption: This is a scenic, wide-angle shot of Venice, Italy. The view captures the city's iconic architecture, including a prominent domed basilica, situated along the bright blue water of a major canal. The shot provides a picturesque and static view of the cityscape.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
